name: Navigator
description: Navigate your spaceship through variety of mazes to reach an artefact.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: x86/x86_64-compatible, 2.0GHz or better processor Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD GraphicsOpenGL 2.1 compatible 3D graphics card with at least 256 MB of addressable memory (ATI Radeon or NVIDIA equivalent) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1200 MB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: x86/x86_64-compatible, 3.0GHz or better processor Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD GraphicsOpenGL 3.2 compatible 3D graphics card with at least 1024MB of addressable memory (ATI Radeon or NVIDIA equivalent) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1200 MB available space Additional Notes: Microsoft Xbox 360 Controller or Direct Input compatible controller
